import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Col, Row, Button, Form, InputGroup, Badge, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ArrowReturnLeft } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import { Store } from '../store'; import Axios from 'axios'; import '../style/Order.css'; const OrderDetail = () => { const { orderId } = useParams(); const [order, setOrder] = useState({}); const { state, dispatch } = useContext(Store); const { userInfo } = state; useEffect(() => { const fetchOrder = async () => { try { const result = await Axios.get(`/api/orders/find/${orderId}/${userInfo._id}`, { headers: { token: `Bearer ${userInfo.accessToken}` }, }); setOrder(result.data); console.log(result.data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } fetchOrder(); }, [orderId]) const orderData = { id: order._id, userInfo: order.userInfo, name: order.name, phone: order.phone, address: order.address, payment: order.payment, cardNumber: order.cardNumber, cardHolder: order.cardHolder, expiryDate: order.expiryDate, cvv: order.cvv, notes: order.notes, total: order.total, status: order.status } console.log(orderData); return order._id !== undefined && (

Order Details

Back to Order Page
{order.products !== undefined && }
) } const ProductList = ({ products, total }) => { return (

Your cart {products.length}

Product
Unit Price
Quantity
Sub-Total
{ products.map((item, key) => ( {item.code} {item.title}
{item.sku.itemName}
Unit Price {item.sku.discount > 0 ? {`$${item.sku.price}`} : `$${item.sku.price}`}
{item.sku.discount > 0 ? `$${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100}` :
} Quantity
{item.quantity}
 Amount ${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100 * item.quantity} )) } Total (HKD) ${total} ) } const OrderForm = ({ orderInfo, date, isAdmin }) => { return ( { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); console.log(values); }} > { ({ values, handleSubmit, handleChange }) => (
Username Email Name Phone Number +852 Address
Payment { values.payment === 'Credit Card' && Credit Card Number Card Holder Name Expiry Date (YYYY-MM) CVV }
{ values.notes.length > 0 && <> Notes
} { isAdmin && Owner's Message (Max. 150 words) } Submitted at Status
) } ) } export default OrderDetail;
